strings.INPUT_INVALID_USERNAME: Your username must be at least 4 characters. Valid characters are A-Z a-z 0-9 . _ -
strings.INPUT_INVALID_EMAIL_ADDRESS: Please enter a valid email address.
strings.INPUT_INVALID_PARENT_EMAIL_ADDRESS: Please enter a valid email address.
strings.INPUT_INVALID_PASSWORD: Your password must be at least 6 characters.
strings.INPUT_INVALID_NEW_PASSWORD: Your password must be at least 6 characters.
strings.INPUT_INVALID_POST_TYPE: Post Type of Response or Content is required.
strings.INPUT_INVALID_RESPONSE_TYPE: Media Type of Video or Image is required.
strings.INPUT_INVALID_START_TIME: You must enter a valid start time.
strings.INPUT_INVALID_END_TIME: You must enter a valid end time.
strings.INPUT_INVALID_JPEG_ONLY: Image file must be a Jpeg.
strings.CHALLENGE_NEEDS_ALL_FIELDS_TO_BE_PUBLISH: The challenge must have a Title, Sort Order, Catalyst, Video, Main Image and Card Image to be published.
The image challenge must have a Title, Sort Order, Catalyst, and Image to be published.
The video challenge must have a Title, Sort Order, Catalyst, Video, Main Image and Card Image to be published.
strings.CHALLENGE_CARD_IMAGE_REQUIRED: You must upload a Card Image (landscape).
strings.CHALLENGE_IMAGE_REQUIRED: You must upload an Image (portrait) for Image Challenges.
strings.CHALLENGE_VIDEO_REQUIRED: You must upload a Video file for Video Challenges.
strings.CHALLENGE_MAIN_IMAGE_REQUIRED: You must upload an Image (portrait) for Video Challenges.
strings.USERNAME_IS_NOT_AVAILABLE: This username has already been used.
strings.EMAIL_ADDRESS_IS_NOT_AVAILABLE: Whoops, someone already snapped up that email address.
strings.EMAIL_ADDRESS_IS_NOT_AVAILABLE_PARENT: The parent email address is already in use by a Maverick.
strings.USERS_CANNOT_BE_CHANGED_TO_PARENT: User type cannot be changed from Kid or Catalyst to Parent.
strings.CANNOT_CREATE_USER_PARENT: Cannot create parent users through admin.
strings.USER_TYPE_KID_MUST_BE_HAVE_BIRTHDATE: User type kid must have a birthdate.
